validateSessionParams(address,uint256,by.details: validates that the call (destinationContract, callValue, funcCallData) complies with the Session Key permissions represented by sessionKeyData

params.callData: the data for the call. is parsed inside the Session Validation Module (SVM)
params.sessionKeyData: SessionKey data, that describes sessionKey permissions
params.to: address of the contract to be called
params.value: value to be sent with the call
